meanings.definition: A fluid-filled cavity in the central nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The neurocoele is a space filled with fluid in the brain.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the neurocoele to understand brain development.
meanings.sent3: The neurocoele decided to throw a party for all the brain cells.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast neurocoele, brimming with thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The neurocoele shimmered like a crystal-clear lake, reflecting the complexities of the brain.

meanings.definition: The central canal of the spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: The neurocoele in the spinal cord allows for the passage of nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Injuries to the neurocoele can affect the function of the spinal cord.
meanings.sent3: The neurocoele in the spine decided to take a relaxing bubble bath.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed through her like a river in the neurocoele of the spine.
meanings.sent5: The neurocoele in the spine was a lifeline, connecting the brain to the rest of the body.
